column1: # GL-VCCI Scope 3 Carbon Intelligence Platform - Transaction Upload Template (CSV)
# - transaction_id: Unique identifier for the transaction (alphanumeric
# - date: Transaction date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)
# - supplier_name: Full legal name of the supplier (max 200 chars)
# - supplier_id: Unique supplier identifier in your system (alphanumeric
# - product_name: Name or description of product/service (max 500 chars)
# - product_category: UNSPSC code or category (see TEMPLATE_GUIDE.md for codes)
# - spend_usd: Total spend amount in USD (numeric
# - currency: Original transaction currency (ISO 4217 code: USD
# - Date must be within last 5 years
# - Quantity and spend_usd must be positive numbers
# - Duplicate transaction_id values will be rejected

AWS EC2 instances for data processing and ML training
Urgent delivery of prototype samples to European clients

Employee travel for client meetings and conferences Q3 2024
Sustainable packaging materials for product distribution
